item.title: Getting started with DotNetNuke
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting DotNetNuke set up or installed.

item.title: The DNN Manifest File for a Module
item.description: This provides an overview of the Manifest file for DNN. Manifest files are the files necessary to install and register a module with the DNN framework. The manifest file can be utilized for extensions in DNN besides just Modules. You can have manifest files for Providers, Skins (Themes) and Containers The Manifest File # The Manifest file in DNN provides the framework with the information necessary to install and register a module.
